title: This is unaceptable
body: So Riot games the makes of league of Fable and well i was just in a game where i went a certain kda in certain time in a certain place and at a certain point in time i relized if time stopped we wouldnt know so if time stopped right now we wouldnt have a clue and also if time travel is possible then its already happened just think about all these mind fucks that could do things to your fucking brain anyways im getting off track its unaceptable that at any given moment we could be at subway while at subway we would get a fucking hamburger from mcdonalds just fucking think about it your really a brain flying a fucking human just how weird is that anyways like im saying time to get to buisness the real reason i brought you here is because FREE TYLER1

replies.body: Was good until the end were you beat a dead horse.
The horse wasent dead if it was already eaten
